mapper.select: SELECT U.user_id ,U.username ,U.password ,U.email ,UP.nickname FROM ( SELECT user_id ,username ,password_hash AS 'password' ,email FROM users WHERE 1=1 AND username = #{username} ) AS U LEFT JOIN user_profile AS UP ON U.user_id = UP.user_id
SELECT user_profile_id ,nickname ,image_path ,`description` ,session_status ,sharing_calendar FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
